members.name: invoiceId
members.description: Unique identifier of the invoice.

members.name: emailAddress

constantValues: The primary email address for the entity.

members.description: The primary email address for the entity.

members.name: name

constantValues: Type a descriptive name for the invoice.

members.description: Type a descriptive name for the invoice.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

members.name: traversedPath

constantValues: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

members.name: billToCity

constantValues: Type the city for the customer's billing address.

members.description: Type the city for the customer's billing address.

members.name: billToComposite

constantValues: Shows the complete Bill To address.

members.description: Type a name for the customer's billing address, such as "Headquarters" or "Field office", to identify the address.

constantValues: Type the ZIP Code or postal code for the billing address.

members.name: dateDelivered

constantValues: Enter the date when the products included in the invoice were delivered.

members.description: Enter the date when the products included in the invoice were delivered.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the invoice, such as shipping details or product substitutions.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the invoice, such as shipping details or product substitutions.

members.name: discountAmount

constantValues: Type the discount amount for the invoice if the customer is eligible for special savings.

members.description: Type the discount amount for the invoice if the customer is eligible for special savings.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: discountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Invoice Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Invoice Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: discountPercentage

constantValues: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Detail Amount field, for use in calculating the Pre-Freight Amount and Total Amount values for the invoice.

members.description: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Detail Amount field, for use in calculating the Pre-Freight Amount and Total Amount values for the invoice.

members.name: dueDate

constantValues: Enter the date by which the invoice should be paid by the customer.

members.description: Enter the date by which the invoice should be paid by the customer.

members.name: freightAmount

constantValues: Type the cost of freight or shipping for the products included in the invoice for use in calculating the total amount due.

members.description: Type the cost of freight or shipping for the products included in the invoice for use in calculating the total amount due.

members.name: freightAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Freight Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Freight Amount in base currency.

members.name: invoiceNumber

constantValues: Shows the identifying number or code of the invoice.

members.description: Shows the identifying number or code of the invoice.

members.name: isPriceLocked

constantValues: Select whether prices specified on the invoice are locked from any further updates.

members.description: Select whether prices specified on the invoice are locked from any further updates.

members.name: lastBackofficeSubmit

constantValues: Enter the date and time when the invoice was last submitted to an accounting or ERP system for processing.

members.description: Enter the date and time when the invoice was last submitted to an accounting or ERP system for processing.

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the invoice is active, paid, or canceled. Paid and canceled invoices are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: totalAmount

constantValues: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discount, freight, and taxes for the invoice.

members.description: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discount, freight, and taxes for the invoice.

members.name: totalAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreight

constantValues: Shows the total product amount due, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the invoice.

members.description: Shows the total product amount due, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the invoice.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreightBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the invoice.

members.description: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the invoice.

members.name: totalDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemAmount

constantValues: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the invoice, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.description: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the invoice, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.name: totalLineItemAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the invoice. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the invoice and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the invoice.

members.description: Shows the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the invoice. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the invoice and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the invoice.

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalTax

constantValues: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the invoice, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the invoice.

members.description: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the invoice, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the invoice.

members.name: totalTaxBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.name: willCall

constantValues: Select whether the products included in the invoice should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick up or delivery instructions.

members.description: Select whether the products included in the invoice should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick up or delivery instructions.

constantValues: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the invoice record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the invoice record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Last SLA that was applied to this invoice. This field is for internal use only.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Last SLA that was applied to this invoice. This field is for internal use only.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows the duration in minutes for which the invoice was on hold.

members.description: Shows the duration in minutes for which the invoice was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the account with which the invoice is associated.

members.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the invoice is associated.
